name: Fog of War
description:
Things can change while we aren't observing them. How do we represent this?
Probably similar to how we question which room has the gold (near the glitter when that's all we know)

We should have a model for how things change in the world, and we can loosely apply that model to our knowledge when we don't see it.
We can "do science" if we really care how much something will change, but we should have a "general idea" from just interacting with things.
